conbody.p: “Direct Financial Interest,” as used in this section, is defined in the clause at HSAR 48 CFR 3052.209–75, Prohibited Financial Interests for Lead System Integrators.
“Lead system integrator,” as used in this section, is defined in the clause at (HSAR) 48 CFR 3052.209–75, Prohibited Financial Interests for Lead System Integrators.
